import React, {useState} from "react"; import {Button} from "react-bootstrap"; import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './Register.scss'; const Register = () => { const [registerForm, setRegisterForm] = useState({ emailValid: false, inputValid: false, formValid: false }); const handleChange = (e, type) => { const {value} = e.target setRegisterForm((prevForm) => ({ ...prevForm, [type]: value, }, () => { validateField(type, value) })) } const validateField = (fieldName, value) => { let emailValid = registerForm.emailValid; let inputValid = registerForm.inputValid; switch (fieldName) { case 'email': emailValid = value.match(/^([\w.%+-]+)@([\w-]+\.)+([\w]{2,})$/i); fieldValidationErrors.email = emailValid ? '' : ' is invalid'; break; default: inputValid = value.length >= 6; fieldValidationErrors.password = inputValid ? '' : ' is too short'; break; } } console.log('========>registerForm', registerForm); return (

Create an account

handleChange(e, "firstName")} />
handleChange(e, "lastName")} />
handleChange(e, "company")} />
handleChange(e, "email")} />
handleChange(e, "password")} />
handleChange(e, "repeatPassword")} />
Already have an account? Log in
) } export default Register;
